subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3414, how did it go?
description_text:
The pedals are really great night and day compared to my Logitech Pedals
that I’ve had for years, but honestly, I don’t think that the vam pros are
for me I had a buddy 3-D print mounts for them and everything I tune them
and they’re just way too loud and they just throw me off my racing

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 4:31 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Gabriel, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few
